user.title: Configure your Tuya Local Lawnmowers device
user.description: Devices can either be added manually or cloud-assisted with the help of the SmartLife app.

cloud.title: Login to Tuya
cloud.description:
Enter your SmartLife or Tuya user code.

You can find this code in the SmartLife app or Tuya app in **Settings** > **Account and Security** screen, and enter the code shown on the **User Code** field. The user code is case sensitive, please be sure to enter it exactly as shown in the app.

scan.title: Complete the login
scan.description:
Use SmartLife app or Tuya app to scan the following QR-code to complete the login.

Continue to the next step once you have completed this step in the app.

choose_device.title: Choose the device to add
choose_device.description:
Please pick the device to add from the first drop-down list. Already added devices are not shown.

If the device connects through a gateway, select that from the gateway list otherwise choose None.

search.title: Locate the device IP address
search.description:
Tuya cloud does not provide local IP addresses so we must now search your local network to find the device. This takes up to 20 seconds.

If unsuccessful you will need to provide the IP address yourself some other way such as from router DHCP assignment.

For this step and the following device addition to succeed you must shut down the mobile app or its connections to the device will often block Tuya Local Lawnmowers communication with them.

local.title: Configure your Tuya Local Lawnmowers device
local.description: [Follow these instructions to find your device id and local key.](https://github.com/cociweb/tuya-local-lawnmowers#finding-your-device-id-and-local-key)

data.device_id: Device ID (or the hub's Device ID for devices connected via gateway)
data.protocol_version: Protocol version (try auto if not known)
data.poll_only: Poll only (try this if your device does not work fully)
data.device_cid: Sub device node_id or uuid (for devices connected via gateway)

select_type.title: Choose the type of device
select_type.description: Choose the type that matches your device

choose_entities.title: Device details
choose_entities.description: Choose a name for this device

abort.already_configured: A device with that ID has already been added.
abort.not_supported: Sorry, there is no support for this device.
abort.no_devices: Unable to find any unregistered devices for the account.

error.connection: Unable to connect to your device with those details. It could be an intermittent issue, or they may be incorrect.
error.does_not_need_hub: Device does not need a gateway and one was selected. Please review your choices.
error.needs_hub: Device needs a gateway and none was selected.
